alert.note: Alert for Northern and Eastern Klamath County and Western Lake County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 02 at 12:44PM PST until December 03 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 4 PM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Sections of central and eastern Lake County. This includes sections of Highway 31 near Summer Lake and higher terrain in the Warner Mountains. * WHEN...From 4 AM to 4 PM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Sunday morning will have the strongest winds. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Northern and Eastern Klamath County and Western Lake County
